text:
@SpeakerPelosi First confirmed COVID19 U.S. death. While this will raise concern, keep in mind, roughly 18,000 people have died in the US this flu season.

Take the same routine precautions (hand washing, don’t touch face, avoid crowds) to prevent both respiratory viral infections.
